name: Create
description: Create.xyz is an AI-powered platform that enables users to build custom web and mobile applications using natural language prompts.
longDescription: Create.xyz is an innovative AI design and development tool that empowers users, regardless of technical expertise, to create fully functional websites, apps, and tools by describing their ideas in plain text. Leveraging advanced AI models like GPT-4 and over 40 integrations, it transforms natural language inputs into production-ready code, streamlining the development process. The platform aims to democratize software creation, making it accessible to non-developers while offering robust features for professionals. By supporting real-time publishing and seamless API integrations, Create.xyz enables rapid iteration and deployment of custom projects. Its mission is to bridge the gap between ideas and implementation, allowing anyone to become a software developer without coding knowledge.
features: Generate fully functional apps and websites from text prompts, enabling rapid development without coding expertise.
Integrate with over 40 APIs, including Stripe, Google Maps, and Stable Diffusion, for versatile functionality.
Support real-time publishing, allowing users to deploy projects instantly to live environments.
Provide version history tracking, enabling users to restore previous app versions with one click.
Offer a no-code builder interface that processes plain text and images to create custom components.
Enable collaboration by allowing teams to design and edit projects using natural language.
Include AI-driven prompt creation tools to streamline UI/UX design specifications.
Support mobile app development with upcoming features for iOS and Android App Store publishing.

faqs.question: What is Create.xyz used for?
faqs.answer: Create.xyz is an AI-powered platform that lets users build websites, apps, and tools by describing their ideas in plain text, transforming them into functional code.

faqs.question: Do I need coding experience to use Create.xyz?
faqs.answer: No, Create.xyz is designed for users with no coding experience, using AI to translate natural language into fully functional applications.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Create.xyz offers a free plan that includes access to public projects, unlimited iterations, and one AI model for development.

faqs.question: Can I integrate external APIs with Create.xyz?
faqs.answer: Yes, Create.xyz supports over 40 API integrations, such as Stripe, Google Maps, and Stable Diffusion, to enhance app functionality.

faqs.question: How do I publish my app or website?
faqs.answer: You can publish your project instantly using Create.xyzâ€™s real-time publishing feature, hosting it on a created.app domain or a custom domain.

faqs.question: Can I edit the generated code manually?
faqs.answer: Yes, advanced users can edit the React code generated by Create.xyz for further customization if desired.

faqs.question: Does Create.xyz support mobile app development?
faqs.answer: Create.xyz is developing features for mobile app creation, with beta support for publishing to iOS and Android App Stores.

faqs.question: How can I contact support for Create.xyz?
faqs.answer: You can reach the Create.xyz team at hello@create.xyz for support, feedback, or partnership inquiries.
